data.title: Bruce Fredrick Boggs
data.meta_description: Bruce Fredrick Boggs, died Thursday May 2, 2019. He was 59 years old. A memorial service will be held Saturday, June 1, 2019 with visitation at 10:00 am and service at 11:00 am at the South Parish Hall at St. Joseph Catholic Parish in Cottleville, MO.
data.text:
loving father, husband, son, brother, uncle and friend died Thursday May 2, 2019.

He was 59 years old.

He was born on July 7, 1959 in Middletown, Ohio; however, spent most of his life in St. Louis, Missouri.

He will be remembered by his generous heart and hilarious sense of humor. He was the life of the party and a jack of all trades.

He is survived by his wife of 24 years, Melinda Boggs; two sons, Branden (21) and Bryan (17); mother, Glenda Boggs; stepmother, Wanda Boggs; siblings, Racine Leahy (Richard Leahy), Richard Boggs (Jeanine Boggs), Barbara O’Brien (Tim O’Brien), Robert Boggs (Sandra Boggs); step siblings, Rob Rechert (Ginny), Brad Rechert (Dwanna), Jennifer Crayne (Howard); uncle to 10 nieces and nephews and 20 grandnieces and grandnephews; and other relatives and friends.

He was preceded in death by his father, Richard Lee Boggs.

A memorial service will be held Saturday,

June 1, 2019 with visitation at 10:00 am and service at 11:00 am

at the South Parish Hall at St. Joseph Catholic Parish in Cottleville, MO.

The family suggests that memorials may be made to the American Heart Association or the charity of one’s choice in lieu of flowers.
